full_summary:
### Tender Announcement

#### Title
Regional Master Standing Offer for Miscellaneous Groceries in Newfoundland and Labrador

#### Solicitation Number
WS4657885781

#### Publication Date
2024-07-05

#### Closing Date
2024-07-15T14:00:00

#### Description

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) is seeking a Regional Master Standing Offer for the supply and delivery of miscellaneous groceries to kitchens and ships in the province of Newfoundland and Labrador. This Standing Offer will be for a period of up to 30 April 2027.

#### Conditions
This Standing Offer will be awarded on an aggregate basis, with a maximum of 1 Standing Offer per zone. The lowest evaluated price will be considered for issuance of a Standing Offer. Bidders may submit separate bids for each zone.

#### Important Details
- Canadian Content Policy is conditionally limited
- Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business (PSIB) applies to Zone 3 Labrador only

#### Zones
Bidders may bid on as many or as few of the following zones as they wish:
* Newfoundland East (Zone 1)
* Newfoundland West (Zone 2)
* Labrador (Zone 3)

#### Evaluation Criteria
Bids will be evaluated on an aggregate basis, with the lowest evaluated price considered for issuance of a Standing Offer.

#### Submission and Inquiry Process
 Queries and Inquiries must be submitted through the Ariba messaging tool.

#### Debriefing Process
Bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation. This request should be made to the Contracting Authority within 15 working days following notification of an unsuccessful bid.

#### Attachments
No attachments are available for this solicitation. Interested bidders should refer to the solicitation for further details. 

Note: Please consult this announcement for specific contract requirements and scope of work. 

 Contact Information
If you have any further questions, kindly contact Anamaria Oprea, [anamaria.oprea@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:anamaria.oprea@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca) for more information. 

Let me assist in making this tender announcement on 400 words as required. We can change anything you need.
